channel.title: On a Rail transit car odometer doesn't increment.
channel.description:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=98415002[/url] On a rail: The odometer doesn't increment, says at 0, this doesn't look intended.
----
In the chapter before I came across this room: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97881296[/url]
I figured shooting the lock would break the lock, but it didn't. It could put a health pack or ammo in that room and give the ability to shoot the lock off.

item.title: On a Rail transit car odometer doesn't increment.
item.dc:creator: sevenalive
item.description:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=98415002
On a rail:
The odometer doesn’t increment, says at 0, this doesn’t look intended.

In the chapter before I came across this room: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97881296

I figured shooting the lock would break the lock, but it didn’t. It could put a health pack or ammo in that room and give the ability to shoot the lock off.

Read full topic
item.source: On a Rail transit car odometer doesn't increment.
